info.name: Bigger Attributes
info.description: Displays attributes in bigger labels, and in larger, bold font.
info.additionalInfo: 18.9.2015. - the current version has labels thickened just enough to be visible at a cursory glance, but small enough not to get in the way of the prompt. It's easy to adjust it to your own preferences by experimenting with the font size and line height a bit, though :)
